arts.sum: Fenerbahce say Jose Mourinho is filing a lawsuit against Galatasaray after the rival club accused him of making racist statements.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho and Fenerbahce file lawsuit against Galatasaray amid racism allegations
arts.sum: The fallout from the Fenerbahce versus Galatasaray match on Monday continues, with the former now confirming they have filed a lawsuit against their arch-rivals

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho: Fenerbahce boss suing Galatasaray after racism allegations
arts.sum: Turkish giants confirmed action on Friday

arts.ttl: José Mourinho takes legal action against Galatasaray after accusation of racism
arts.sum: Recriminations continue between Fenerbahce and Gala Portuguese given four-game ban and fine over comments José Mourinho is suing Galatasaray, claiming damages after the club accused him of making “racist statements”. Fenerbahce announced on Friday that Mourinho has launched the action through the club’s lawyers as the angry recriminations continue from Monday’s 0-0 Turkish Super Lig draw between the two rival clubs. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Fenerbahce says it has filed lawsuit against Galatasaray over 'attack' on coach Jose Mourinho
arts.sum: “We would like to announce to the public that a lawsuit for moral damages of 1 million 907 thousand Turkish liras has been filed against Galatasaray Sports Club by Fenerbahçe Sports Club lawyers due to the attack on the personal rights of our Technical Director Jose Mourinho,” it said in a statement. Turkish soccer team Fenerbahce said Friday it had filed a lawsuit against rival Galatasaray for an “attack on the personal rights” of coach Jose Mourinho.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Jose Mourinho SUES Galatasaray after being accused of racism
arts.sum: Galatasaray accused Jose Mourinho of making "racist statements" after he said their bench were "jumping like monkeys" and that the fixture was better for being refereed by Slovenian official Slavko Vincic rather than one from Turkey

arts.ttl: Preview: Kasimpasa vs. Galatasaray - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Turkish Super Lig clash between Kasimpasa and Galatasaray, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
Fenerbahce say Jose Mourinho is filing a lawsuit against Galatasaray after the rival club accused him of making racist statements.
Jose Mourinho is suing Galatasaray for around £42,000 over “moral damages”, Fenerbahce have confirmed.

arts.ttl: Fenerbahce to SUE Galatasaray over Jose Mourinho statement as Rangers Europa League rivals fire back in race row
arts.sum: The fallout from the Istanbul derby continues with Mourinho at the eye of the storm after post match comments
